events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Lisa M. has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect item I received instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund request has been processed and is now complete. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Since your refund was completed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
